20110105174635.000|20110105174635.000|CC1|CALORIES.                       
20110105174635.000|20110105174636.000|CC1|MAKE A SPRITZ ZERO THREE TIMES A
20110105174636.000|20110105174637.000|CC1|WEEK.

20110105174639.000|20110105174641.000|CC1|AND HALF SPARKLING WATER.       
20110105174641.000|20110105174643.000|CC1|YOU SAVE ALMOST 10,000 CALORIES,
20110105174643.000|20110105174643.000|CC1|TWO AND A HALF POUNDS AND IF YOU
20110105174643.000|20110105174645.000|CC1|REALLY WANT TO DO SOMETHING     
20110105174645.000|20110105174647.000|CC1|GOOD, DRINK OUT OF A TALL THIN  
20110105174647.000|20110105174648.000|CC1|GLASS BECAUSE REGGIE SHOWS THAT 
20110105174648.000|20110105174651.000|CC1|WE ACTUALLY DRINK 25-30% LESS

20110105174656.000|20110105174657.000|CC1|THEIR EYES.

20110105174700.000|20110105174703.000|CC1|YOU AUTOMATIC WILL YOU HAVE --  
20110105174703.000|20110105174704.000|CC1|AUTOMATICALLY HAVE LESS.
